snippet: The teenager, Marcell Dockery, is now accused of second-degree murder and is being held in protective custody at Rikers Island.
abstract: Teenager Marcell Dockery is charged with second-degree murder following death of New York City Police Officer Dennis Guerra; Dockery admitted to setting fire in hallway of Brooklyn high-rise in which Guerra and his partner, Officer Rosa Rodriguez, were critically injured.
lead_paragraph: The teenager, Marcell Dockery, is now accused of second-degree murder and is being held in protective custody at Rikers Island.

headline.main: Murder Charge for Teenager in Fire That Killed an Officer
headline.print_headline: Murder Charge for Teenager in Fire That Killed an Officer
